text: G-Man can be any of the following: * G-Man (slang), slang for Federal Bureau of Investigation agents, short for "Government Man" * G-Man (Half-Life), a fictional character in the Half-Life computer game series * The G-Man, a nickname for G. Gordon Liddy on his radio show * G-Man (British artist), minimal techno artist Gez Varley
title: G-Man
